# thetalake_retention_policy (Resource)

Theta Lake Retention Policy Resource. Manages a retention policy in Theta Lake.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "thetalake_retention_policy" "example" {
  name                  = "Example Policy"
  description           = "Retain data for 1 year"
  retention_period_days = 365
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Retention Policy Name

### Optional

- `description` (String) Retention Policy Description
- `retention_period_days` (Number) Retention Period in Days

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Retention Policy ID
